original: NYSTRÖM, Magnus, Grosshandlare, Halmstad, f Halmstad 17/12 74 av handl M Johansson o Christina Simonsson, gm Anna Persson. Etabl eg fma 99 o inneh den t 37, då den överläts på Magnus Nyströms AB. Hed.ordf i Hall Köpm.frb o Halmstads Köpm.frn, ordf 0 kassaförv i Hall Köpm.frbs Understödsfrn, v. ordf i hdls- & sjöf.nmd, huvudm o v. ordf 1 Halmstads Sparbk, har varit v. ordf i AB Smal Bks avd.kont, styr.led i Sv Köpm.frb o Halmstads Hdlsfrn, led av livsmedelsnmd 15 —18, folksk.styr, fattigv.styr o styr f yrkes-o lärl.sk. Resor: Tyskl, Schweiz, Ital o Frankr. Frimurare (X), RVO. Hobby: Skogsvård.
translated: NYSTRÖM, Magnus, Merchant, Halmstad, born in Halmstad on 17/12 1874, son of merchant M Johansson and Christina Simonsson, married to Anna Persson. Established own business in 1899 and owned it until 1937, when it was transferred to Magnus Nyströms AB. Honorary chairman of the Halland Merchants Association and Halmstad Merchants Association, chairman and treasurer of the Halland Merchants Association Support Fund, vice chairman of the Trade and Maritime Board, chairman and vice chairman of Halmstad Savings Bank, vice chairman of AB Smal Bank's branch office, board member of the Swedish Merchants Association and Halmstad Trade Association, member of the Food Committee from 1915 to 1918, member of school board, poor relief board, and board of vocational and apprentice school. Travelled to Germany, Switzerland, Italy and France. Freemason (X), RVO (Order of Vasa). Hobby: Forestry management.
